title: indap-piLLai enna seyyum
sahitya:
(rAgA:  aThANA)   
  indap-piLLai enna seyyum idarkenna teriyum enpAl
andap-pakkam parkkaiyilE adu adanai veNNaiyum tinnum


anupallavi



caraNam 1    annaiyaval ariyaLO El adanaiyum puriyAdO aduvum avan sei mAyamO
kalaiyilum malaiyilum vElai enakkillaiyO nan cakkaramAi shuzhalgaiyil seyyum kurumbugal ettanaiyO
   caraNam 2  (rAgA:  kAnaDA)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 D N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G2 M1 R2 S  mantiramO adennavO mAdhavan maraindan kAriyam Edumillai
avanaik kANavum illai vIDellam oliyizhandu irundadE veynguzhal 
gAnam engO senrolindade inap-pillai enna seyyum idu enren aham varum
    caraNam 3  (rAgA:  madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  mAyamO ena avan maru murai vandAn mangaLame pongude 
engengum mAyak -kuzhal kETkudE kazhalaNi silambolikka 
kaNNanum ennaham vandAn kaNNanum ennaham vandAn
